info.title: Prison Person API
info.description: API for access to Prison Person Data (data about a person that is specific to their time in prison)

tags.name: Field History
tags.description: The history of changes to fields linked to a prisoner, such as height, weight, hair, facial hair, face shape, build, eye colour and shoe size.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: The health information for a prisoner

tags.name: Physical Attributes
tags.description: The physical attributes of a prisoner - height, weight, hair, facial hair, face shape, build, eye colour and shoe size.

tags.name: Reference Data Domains
tags.description: Reference Data Domains for Prison Person data

tags.name: Sync with NOMIS
tags.description: Endpoints to keep the Prison Person database in sync with changes in the NOMIS database

tags.name: Prison Person Data
tags.description: Data about a person that is specific to their time in prison

tags.name: Prison Person Photographs
tags.description: The photographs linked to a prisoner

tags.name: Migration from NOMIS
tags.description: Endpoints to facilitate migration of data from NOMIS to the Prison Person database

tags.name: Identifying marks
tags.description: Identifying marks linked to a prisoner

tags.name: Reference Data Codes
tags.description: Reference Data Codes for Prison Person data

put.summary: SYNC endpoint to sync changes to profile details physical attributes made in NOMIS
put.description:
This endpoint SHOULD ONLY BE USED IN ORDER TO SYNC CHANGES MADE IN NOMIS. There is a separate endpoint for normal editing of the Physical Attributes.

Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PROFILE_DETAILS_PHYSICAL_ATTRIBUTES_SYNC__RW`

Edits can be made to profile details physical attributes in NOMIS to both the current booking and to old bookings. This sync API can handle both by accepting the `appliesFrom` and `appliesTo` timestamps - `appliesFrom` should be equal to the point in time that the edit happened, and `appliesTo` should be null. For edits to historical bookings `appliesFrom` should be equal to the booking start date and and `appliesTo` should be equal to the booking end date. The `lastModifiedAt` date should always be the point in time that the user made the edit.

get.summary: GET endpoint for the physical attributes NOMIS sync
get.description:
This endpoint SHOULD ONLY BE USED TO GET PHYSICAL ATTRIBUTES AS PART OF THE NOMIS SYNC. There is a separate endpoint for normal GET of the Physical Attributes.

Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PHYSICAL_ATTRIBUTES_SYNC__RW`

put.summary: SYNC endpoint to sync changes to physical attributes made in NOMIS
put.description:
This endpoint SHOULD ONLY BE USED IN ORDER TO SYNC CHANGES MADE IN NOMIS. There is a separate endpoint for normal editing of the Physical Attributes.

Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PHYSICAL_ATTRIBUTES_SYNC__RW`

Edits can be made to physical attributes in NOMIS to both the current booking and to old bookings. This sync API can handle both by accepting the `appliesFrom` and `appliesTo` timestamps - `appliesFrom` should be equal to the booking start date and and `appliesTo` should be equal to the booking end date. The `createdAt` date should always be the point in time that the user made the edit.

put.summary: MIGRATION endpoint to sync changes to profile details physical attributes made in NOMIS
put.description:
This endpoint SHOULD ONLY BE USED IN ORDER TO MIGRATE DATA.

Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PROFILE_DETAILS_PHYSICAL_ATTRIBUTES_MIGRATION__RW` user made the edit.

201.description: Returns a list of IDS of field history records created during the migration

put.summary: MIGRATION endpoint to sync changes to physical attributes made in NOMIS
put.description:
This endpoint SHOULD ONLY BE USED IN ORDER TO MIGRATE DATA.

Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PHYSICAL_ATTRIBUTES_MIGRATION__RW` user made the edit.

post.summary: Post a profile picture for a prisoner
post.description:
description = "Stores a profile picture supplied on the file attribute of a multipart/form-date submission  
returns the meta data for the stored document"
Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PRISON_PERSON_DATA__RO`

file.description: File part of the multipart request

post.description:
description = "Stores a new identifying mark entry in the database. Optionally stores an image file supplied on the file attribute of a multipart/form-date submission  
returns the identifying mark detail"
Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PRISON_PERSON_DATA__RW`

file.description: File part of the multipart request

patch.summary: Updates the physical attributes (height and weight) for a prisoner
Updates the health information for a prisoner

get.description: Returns the list of reference data domains. By default this endpoint only returns active reference data domains. The `includeInactive` parameter can be used to return all reference data domains. Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__REFERENCE_DATA__RO`

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Include inactive reference data domains. Defaults to false.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description: Returns the reference data domain, including all reference data codes linked to that domain. Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__REFERENCE_DATA__RO`

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: Not found, the reference data domain was not found

get.summary: Get all reference data codes for {domain}
get.description: Returns the list of reference data codes within {domain}. By default this endpoint only returns active reference data codes. The `includeInactive` parameter can be used to return all reference data codes. Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__REFERENCE_DATA__RO`

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Include inactive reference data codes. Defaults to false. Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__REFERENCE_DATA__RO`

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: Not found, the reference data domain was not found

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

404.description: Not found, the reference data code was not found

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field to get history for

schema.description: The field to get history for

get.summary: Get a document file from documents service using document uuid.
get.description: Get a document from documents service using document uuid. Requires ROLE_CVL_ADMIN.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The uuid of the photograph required

get.summary: Get all photographs for a prisoner
get.description:
description = "Returns document properties and metadata associated with the document. The document file must be 
downloaded separately using the GET /COMING_SOON."
Requires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PRISON_PERSON_DATA__RO`

get.summary: Get all identifying marks for a prisoner
get.description: description = "Returns a list of identifying marks for a prisoner.Images associated with the identifying marks must be downloaded separatelyRequires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PRISON_PERSON_DATA__RW`

200.description: Returns identifying marks for the prisoner

get.description: description = "Returns the identifying mark requested.Images associated with the identifying mark must be downloaded separatelyRequires role `ROLE_PRISON_PERSON_API__PRISON_PERSON_DATA__RW`

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The uuid of the identifying mark

200.description: Returns identifying marks for the prisoner

appliesFrom.description: The timestamp indicating from when these profile details physical attributes were true for the prisoner. For edits to the current booking, this should be equal to the 'createdAt' date. For edits to historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking start date.

appliesTo.description: The timestamp of when these profile details physical attributes should no longer be considered applicable. For edits to the current booking, this should be left null. For edits to historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking end date.

latestBooking.description: An indication of whether the edit was performed to the latest booking. If this is not the latest booking, the edit will be inserted into field history but the physical attributes table will not be updated.

ProfileDetailsPhysicalAttributesSyncRequ.description: Request object for syncing a prisoner's profile details physical attributes

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when this record was last edited in NOMIS

lastModifiedBy.description: The username of who last edited the record in NOMIS

fieldHistoryInserted.description: The IDs of field history inserted during the sync

items.description: The IDs of field history inserted during the sync

ProfileDetailsPhysicalAttributesSyncResp.description: Profile Details Physical Attributes Sync Response

height.description: Height (in centimetres). May be left null if no data available for height.

weight.description: Weight (in kilograms). May be left null if no data available for weight.

appliesTo.description: The timestamp of when these physical attributes should no longer be considered applicable. For edits to the current booking, this should be left null. For edits to historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking end date.

createdAt.description: The timestamp indicating when this record was last edited in NOMIS.

createdBy.description: The username of who last edited the record in NOMIS

latestBooking.description: An indication of whether the edit was performed to the latest booking. If this is not the latest booking, the edit will be inserted into field history but the physical attributes table will not be updated.

fieldHistoryInserted.description: The IDs of field history inserted during the sync

items.description: The IDs of field history inserted during the sync

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when this record was last edited in NOMIS

lastModifiedBy.description: The username of who last edited the record in NOMIS

appliesFrom.description: The timestamp indicating from when these physical attributes were true for the prisoner. For migration of the current booking, this should be equal to the 'createdAt' date. For migration of historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking start date.

appliesTo.description: The timestamp of when these physical attributes should no longer be considered applicable. For migration of the current booking, this should be left null. For migration of historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking end date.

fieldHistoryInserted.description: The IDs of field history created during the migration

items.description: The IDs of field history created during the migration

ProfileDetailsPhysicalAttributesMigratio.description: Profile Details Physical Attributes Migration Response

height.description: Height (in centimetres). May be left null if no data available for height.

weight.description: Weight (in kilograms). May be left null if no data available for weight.

appliesFrom.description: The timestamp indicating from when these physical attributes were true for the prisoner. For migration of the current booking, this should be equal to the 'createdAt' date. For migration of historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking start date.

appliesTo.description: The timestamp of when these physical attributes should no longer be considered applicable. For migration of the current booking, this should be left null. For migration of historical bookings, this should be equal to the booking end date.

createdBy.description: The username of who last edited the record in NOMIS

items.description: The IDs of field history created during the migration

prisonerNumber.description: The prisoner number of the prisoner this identifying mark is associated with.

bodyPart.description: Part of body the identifying mark is on. `ReferenceDataCode.id`.

side.description: Side of the body part the mark is on. `ReferenceDataCode.id`.

partOrientation.description: Orientation of the mark on the body part. `ReferenceDataCode.id`.

comment.example: Long healed scar from an old fight

id.description: The id of the identifying mark

prisonerNumber.description: The prisoner number of the prisoner this identifying mark is associated with

items.description: List of photograph UUIDs associated with this identifying mark

createdAt.description: The date and time the data was last modified

createdBy.description: Username of the user that last modified this field

description.description: Description of the reference data code

listSequence.description: The sequence number of the reference data code. Used for ordering reference data correctly in lists and dropdowns. 0 is default order by description.

isActive.description: Indicates that the reference data code is active and can be used. Inactive reference data codes are not returned by default in the API

ReferenceDataSimpleDto.description: Reference Data Simple DTO - for use in dropdowns

PhysicalAttributesUpdateRequest.description: Request object for updating a prisoner's physical attributes. Can include one or multiple attributes. If an attribute is not provided, it will not be updated.  If an attribute is provided and set to 'null' it will be updated to equal 'null'.

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp this field was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: Username of the user that last modified this field

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp this field was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: Username of the user that last modified this field

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp this field was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: Username of the user that last modified this field

PrisonerHealthUpdateRequest.description: Request object for updating a prisoner's health information. Can include one or multiple fields. If an attribute is provided and set to 'null' it will be updated equal to 'null'. If it is not provided it is not updated

domain.description: Short code for the reference data code

code.description: Short code for reference data code

description.description: Description of the reference data code

listSequence.description: The sequence number of the reference data code. Used for ordering reference data correctly in lists and dropdowns. 0 is default order by description.

isActive.description: Indicates that the reference data code is active and can be used. Inactive reference data codes are not returned by default in the API

createdAt.description: The date and time the reference data code was created

createdBy.description: The username of the user who created the reference data code

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time the reference data code was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified the reference data code

deactivatedAt.description: The date and time the reference data code was deactivated

deactivatedBy.description: The username of the user who deactivated the reference data code

code.description: Short code for the reference data domain

description.description: Description of the reference data domain

listSequence.description: The sequence number of the reference data domain. Used for ordering domains correctly in lists. 0 is default order by description.

isActive.description: Indicates that the reference data domain is active and can be used. Inactive reference data domains are not returned by default in the API

createdAt.description: The date and time the reference data domain was created

createdBy.description: The username of the user who created the reference data domain

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time the reference data domain was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified the reference data domain

deactivatedAt.description: The date and time the reference data domain was deactivated

deactivatedBy.description: The username of the user who deactivated the reference data domain

referenceDataCodes.description: The reference data codes associated with this reference data domain

valueInt.description: Integer value of the field in the date range `appliesFrom` to `appliesTo`

valueString.description: String value of the field in the date range `appliesFrom` to `appliesTo`

appliesFrom.description: The timestamp the field value applies from

appliesTo.description: The timestamp the field value applies up to. If null, the value currently applies.

createdAt.description: The date and time the field history entry was created

createdBy.description: The username of the user who created the field history entry

migratedAt.description: The date and time the field history entry was migrated

mergedAt.description: The date and time the field history entry was merged

mergedFrom.description: The Prisoner Number the field history entry was merged from

source.description: The source of the change, either DPS or NOMIS. Will be NOMIS if the record was either migrated or synced from NOMIS
